text:
vA a#ddhvaqryOH pra#tiqShThAM ~MvEdaq pratyEqva ti#ShThatiq yatOq manyEqtAna#Bikramya hOShyAqmItiq tat tiShThaqnnA SrA#vayEdEqShA vA a#ddhvaqryOH pra#tiqShThA ya EqvaM ~MvEdaq pratyEqva ti#ShThatiq yada#Biqkramya# juhuqyAt pra#tiqShThAyA# iyAqt tasmA$th samAqnatraq tiShTha#tA hOtaqvya#M prati#ShThityaiq yO vA a#ddhvaqryOH svaM ~MvEdaq 
svavA#nEqva Ba#vatiq srugvA a#syaq svaM ~MvA#yaqvya#masyaq - [  ]   7
